divs: Sighting DetailsIn the car in the drive way listening to the radio. My boyfriend woke me up asked me if I saw anything outside. And we both noticed a star like object just standing still hovering not making a sound just blinking colored lights (red, blue, green, and orange). We've been watching it for about an hour now and it's still not moving. There are no clouds in the sky. Perfect clear night. Only stars no plains helicopters or ect. It's now 12:48am.
Summary: To far to see but flashing red blue green and orange lights.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Wingdale
This sighting has never been favorited.
